name: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
review: A gripping psychological thriller with a stunning twist that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

name: Educated
author: Tara Westover
review: A powerful memoir about resilience, self-discovery, and the transformative power of education.

name: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
review: An insightful guide on building good habits and breaking bad ones with practical strategies and tips.

name: Where the Crawdads Sing
author: Delia Owens
review: A haunting tale of a young girl growing up in isolation, with a blend of mystery and love.

name: Becoming
author: Michelle Obama
review: An intimate and inspiring memoir by the former First Lady of the United States.

name: The Catcher in the Rye
author: Mark Manson
review: A counterintuitive approach to living a good life by embracing life's challenges and letting go of unrealistic expectations.
